title: [Question] unable to attend convocation . how do i get my degree certificate can college courier it or i have to go collect in person?
content: \[Question\] unable to attend convocation . how do i get my degree certificate can college courier it or i have to go collect in person?

comments.body: yes, you can go and collect from CoE, in person. No courier is provided afaik
what about 8th sem certificate tho, couldnt collect because I was in job.
contact your department, not sure on that. or CoE might be having it
